ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to the participants for their dedication and contribution to the research. We thank the support from the Public Health and Preventive Medicine Provincial Experiment Teaching Center at Sichuan University and the Food Safety Monitoring and Risk Assessment Key Laboratory of Sichuan Province. This study was supported by the National Mega Projects of Science and Technology in 13 th Five-Year Plan of China: Technical Platform for Communicable Disease Surveillance Project (2017ZX10103010â€“002).
